channel.title: DevNation on Experiences of a developer
channel.description: Recent content in DevNation on Experiences of a developer

item.title: Rx.js Session at DevNation
item.description: I presented a Session on Rx.js at DevNation this year. My goal was to impress upon the audience how Observables can be interpreted as a collection-in-time. This analogy was very well described by @jhusain his Async Javascript at Netflix talk that initially got me excited about Reactive Functional programming. My contribution to this idea is to present it in a visual way. To visualize both a "regular" collection, as well as a collection-in-time, I used the d3.
